attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review:
Oh my, I wanted to see if I could find the power within me to love the president again, after seeing what ours was about, I’m disGUSTed in what I saw. Trump isn’t okay. At all. 
Oh the app crashed a lot too I guess 🌹

attributes.title: This app was very, very slow.
attributes.review: This app is extremely slow. It took about 30 minutes to load.

attributes.title: Speaks for itself
attributes.review: 9 stars from me I search for hours and ads and I still could not find anything remotely ok with this man. 0 out of ten if I could.

attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: No app I’ve ever downloaded has been worse than this and I’ve played candy crush so that’s saying something

attributes.title: Arrest the cops who killed Breonna Taylor😌✨🧚‍♂️
attributes.review:
How can apple put an app like this on the App Store!? Absolutely atrocious. I opened up the trump app and a bunch of photos of nude females started popping up. I am disgusted at the these acts of our so called president. Shame on him. 

JUSTICE FOR VANESSA GUILLEN🇲🇽
BLACK LIVES MATTER✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: once i got this app it started to track me and a strange black vehicle started following ne everywhere, dont get this app or else this will happen, as soon as i saw who hot out of the van i was so surprised, it was the orange skinned cheeto puff himself🥰 ugly a-

attributes.title: Severely disappointed😔
attributes.review: The second I opened the app I was met with a nasty cheeto man. It really ruined my day😔. I would not recommend anyone to get this atrocity to prevent yourself from self induced sleep paralysis without the sleep😱.

attributes.title: BAD!!!!!😡😡😡🤬🤬😠😠
attributes.review:
TERRIBLE. you had to register. i’m not associating my phone number or email with the disgusting cheeto. the app background was ugly too, hurt my eyes. all trump supporters are ugly and stupid 🙈✨
so anyways it’s a no ❤️ CAN THEY PLEASE GET THIS APP OFF THE APP STORE!!! it’s not a question it’s a demand

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: If there was an option to rate it 0 stars I would. Horrible app crashes your phone. And I’m pretty sure hacks into all your information 🤮😣#freebarron #freemelania

attributes.title: Why me 😭
attributes.review: I got the app to help me learn a little bit about my president but I regret that decision because they have wasted my time where I could’ve been watching Tik Tok 😖 so all I have to say is why me Mr. President why me🙁
